skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart aroma
des:
The Aroma skill allows owners of a W300 Aromatherapy machine to easily command their device using your voice; just ask Alexa from the comfort of your home! Your W300 Aromatherapy machine must be equipped with the Aroma system, and registered for Aroma Access connected services. In order for Alexa to connect to Aroma, you must create a Aroma account by downloading the Aroma mobile app. Once you have the Aroma account setup and the Alexa skill enabled, you can:

To Get Started: Say “ Alexa, tell Smart Aroma, turn on the W300”. Then, the W300 is on.
By default, the W300 will be high mist and the light will loop automatically in seven colors until you say another command to change it. 

High Mist/Low Mist Mode: Say “ Alexa, tell Smart Aroma, set the W300 to sleep mode”. Then the W300 will set to high mist/low mist mode. 

Sleep Mode: Say “ Alexa, tell Smart Aroma, set the W300 to sleep mode”. Then the W300 will set to sleep mode. By default, the colorful lights and indicator lights are off. The quantity of mist is decreased. The speed of fan is reduced. 
Change Light Color: Say “ Alexa, tell Smart Aroma , set the W300 to red / orange / yellow / green / blue / cyan / purple”.

Count Down: To limit the time that the W300 will be off, first turn the W300 on using one of the above methods and then say “ Alexa, tell Smart Aroma , set the W300 count down 0 /1 / 3 / 6 hour”.

Alarm: To turn on / off the device at the time you want, you can say “ Alexa, tell Smart Aroma , turn the W300 on / off at six o'clock” or “ Alexa, tell Smart Aroma , turn the W300 on / off at three pm”.
